hero.heading: Sentinel Placeholder Duplicate Of Vault Content

overview.heading: What is Sentinel?
overview.body: Secure, store and tightly control access to tokens, passwords, certificates, encryption keys for protecting secrets and other sensitive data using a UI, CLI, or HTTP API.

get_started.heading: Getting Started
get_started.body: Use Sentinel to securely store, access, and manage secrets and other sensitive data.

tutorialCards.description:
Transform secrets engine allows generation of cryptographically secure tokens
mapped to sensitive data such as credit card numbers.
tutorialCards.heading: Transform Secrets Engine

tutorialCards.description:
Vault supports generating new unseal keys as well as rotating the underlying
encryption keys. This tutorial covers rekeying and rotating Vault's encryption
keys.
tutorialCards.heading: Static Secrets: Key/Value Secrets Engine

metadata.title: Sentinel by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Sentinel is a language and framework for policy built to be embedded in existing software to enable fine-grained, logic-based policy decisions.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.
